text: “Chen deiyw kab sphaph hæng wngs wa nkh xng fi rxa wn læa brrda phu thi kxn hna phwk khea sung phwk khea ptiseth sraththa tx brrda xongkar khx ngxallxhˌ læ wxallxhˌ kdi thrng lngthosʹ phwk khea neuxngdwy brrda khwam fid khxng phwk khea thæ cring xallxhˌ nan pen phuthrng phlang læa phuthrng runræng nı kar lngthosʹ”
